name: Hungry Chef (itch)
description: Welcome to Hungry Chef, the product of a game jam from three pre-college students, designed in 5 days, with the restraint to the theme of cooking. In this pixelated platformer, battle against the clock as you try to manage your hunger, which is constantly decreasing, while meeting the clear conditions for each level. Fight a multitude of unique enemies and get back to your restaurant alive.
